rules.description: Revive dead Tilde key on Norwegian keyboard
Revive dead backtick key on Norwegian keyboard

to.shell_command: front=$(lsappinfo info -only name $(lsappinfo front) | cut -d'"' -f4); if [ "$front" = "Claude" ]; then osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to keystroke "h" using command down'; else open -a "Claude"; fi

front=$(lsappinfo info -only name $(lsappinfo front) | cut -d'"' -f4); if [ "$front" = "Codex" ]; then osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to keystroke "h" using command down'; else open -a "Codex"; fi

front=$(lsappinfo info -only name $(lsappinfo front) | cut -d'"' -f4); if [ "$front" = "1Password" ]; then osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to keystroke "h" using command down'; else open -a "1Password"; fi

front=$(lsappinfo info -only name $(lsappinfo front) | cut -d'"' -f4); if [ "$front" = "Firefox Developer Edition" ]; then osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to keystroke "h" using command down'; else open -a "Firefox Developer Edition"; fi

front=$(lsappinfo info -only name $(lsappinfo front) | cut -d'"' -f4); if [ "$front" = "Code" ]; then osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to keystroke "h" using command down'; else open -a "Visual Studio Code"; fi

front=$(lsappinfo info -only name $(lsappinfo front) | cut -d'"' -f4); if [ "$front" = "Slack" ]; then osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to keystroke "h" using command down'; else open -a "Slack"; fi

front=$(lsappinfo info -only name $(lsappinfo front) | cut -d'"' -f4); if [ "$front" = "Notion" ]; then osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to keystroke "h" using command down'; else open -a "Notion"; fi

front=$(lsappinfo info -only name $(lsappinfo front) | cut -d'"' -f4); if [ "$front" = "WezTerm" ]; then osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to keystroke "h" using command down'; else open -a "WezTerm"; fi

front=$(lsappinfo info -only name $(lsappinfo front) | cut -d'"' -f4); if [ "$front" = "Messenger" ]; then osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to keystroke "h" using command down'; else open -a "Messenger"; fi

front=$(lsappinfo info -only name $(lsappinfo front) | cut -d'"' -f4); if [ "$front" = "DevToys" ]; then osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to set visible of process "DevToys" to false'; else open -a "DevToys"; fi

front=$(lsappinfo info -only name $(lsappinfo front) | cut -d'"' -f4); if [ "$front" = "Azure VPN Client" ]; then osascript -e 'tell app "System Events" to keystroke "h" using command down'; else open -a "Azure VPN Client"; fi
